vehicles.description: A white vehicle ahead in the same lane, positioned slightly to the left, facing in the same direction as the ego vehicle
vehicles.explanation: The presence and movement of this vehicle directly influence the ego vehicle's speed and following distance.

vulnerable_road_users.description: A small animal, possibly a dog, crossing the road from left to right ahead of the ego vehicle
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: The animal represents an unpredictable hazard and requires the ego vehicle to reduce speed or stop to avoid a collision.

traffic signs.description: A large red banner on the left side of the road with white Chinese characters
traffic signs.explanation: While the content of the sign is not related to traffic regulations, its size and placement may distract drivers or obscure other road users or signs.

general_perception.description and explanation: In the traffic image, there is a white vehicle ahead in the same lane, positioned slightly to the left and facing in the same direction as the ego vehicle. This vehicle influences the ego vehicle's speed and following distance due to its presence and movement. Additionally, a small animal, likely a dog, is crossing the road from left to right ahead of the ego vehicle, representing an unpredictable hazard that necessitates the ego vehicle to reduce speed or stop to avoid a collision. On the left side of the road, there is a large red banner with white Chinese characters, which may distract drivers or obscure other road users or signs despite its content not being related to traffic regulations.

driving_suggestion: The ego vehicle should reduce speed and be prepared to stop to allow the animal to cross safely. Simultaneously, maintain a safe following distance from the vehicle ahead and be cautious of potential distractions from the large banner. Be attentive for any other road users that may be obscured or any instructions from traffic signs that are not visible in the image.
